attributes.action: Bring in a law to commence proceedings to sack the speaker of the house.
attributes.additional_details: Information relating to the role of the speaker of the house can be found on https://www.parliament.uk/about/mps-and-lords/principal/speaker/
attributes.background:
The Speaker is the chief officer and highest authority of the House of Commons and must remain politically impartial at all times.
The time has come for us to question our current speaker and his inability to remain impartial. 
Mr Bercow should be removed forthwith.
